definition: to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
filial/dutiful/devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc)/to show filial piety towards (an older family member)/filial piety
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)
(of parents) to bring up children for the purpose of being looked after in old age
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)
to regard men as superior to women (idiom)

Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
